response.overview: "I hide as a child in the forest and cried because I was so poor, really true." With 15 Juergen Blin run away from home and hired to a freighter. This was followed by an apprenticeship as an butcher and the discovery of boxing. In 1971, he fought against Muhammad Ali. Blin is a biter, someone who makes his own way. Especially because of strong setbacks, he fought himself through life. A man who can't do nothing. - Written by Against Reality Pictures
response.title: Der Einzelkämpfer
